FancyBox Lighbox Jquery Plugin. 
FancyBox is a tool for displaying images, html content and 
multi-media in a Mac-style “lightbox” that floats overtop of 
web page. It was built using the jQuery library. 
Licensed under both MIT and GPL licenses
http://designresourcebox.com/fancybox-lighbox-jquery-plugin/

Xmlnuke uses a unchanged version of Fancybox. 

Fancybox v1.3.4

To use in your XSL you MUST add the follow snippets:
- HTMLHEADERS inside <head> section
- HTMLBODY at the end of document

All changes made by João Gilberto Magalhães at 2011-08-07
